FuncDef:
The dhcp-server group command associates the address pool with the DHCPv4 server group.
The undo dhcp-server group command removes the association between the address pool and the DHCPv4 server group.
By default, the address pool with the DHCPv4 server group is not associated.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the DHCPv4 server group.
The value is a string of 1-32 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command is applicable to only the remote address pool.
To associate a DHCPv4 server with an address pool, you must create the DHCPv4 server group by using the dhcp-server group command in the system view.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
